alert.note: Alert for Buffalo (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 4:54PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Buffalo County through 530 PM CDT... At 454 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Gibbon, or 10 miles northeast of Kearney, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pleasanton, but mainly rural areas between Kearney and Pleasanton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
